title: MR.SIGA Heavy Duty Scrub Sponge - Pack of 24, Size:11 x 7 x 3cm
features: HEAVY DUTY. Premium green scrubbing material made in Italy helps to tackle tough chores, durable and long lasting. The non-abrasive yellow sponge side wipes away the dirt and particles, can be used with dishwashing liquid if preferred. So they are strong enough to clean stubborn dirt, yet gentle enough to use on special glassware.

BIGGER THICKER & LONG LASTING. MR.SIGA scrub sponges maintain the shape well and do not fall apart or crack easily as regular sponges, they last a long time even while scrubbing tough burned food. Rinse with water after every use, they will dry quickly and don't get smelly.

MULTI-PURPOSE CLEANING. Easy to clean your dishes, pots, pans, sinks, stoves, appliances, bathroom, garage, kitchen effectively and effortlessly. The S shape design is ergonomic for better grip, and fits your hand comfortably.

BULK PACK & SAVE MONEY. You pay less, but get a value pack, each package comes with 24 pcs and allows you to use for a decent amount of time. You don't have to feel bad even you change your sponges frequently.
MR.SIGA's mission: Make your housework easier, and make the world cleaner.
